mapper.select: SELECT m.id id,m.title title,m.dsf_url dsfUrl,i.image_url image_url,i.width width,i.height height FROM t_moudle m JOIN t_image i ON m.image_id=i.id
SELECT i.id id,i.group_id group_id, i.image_url image_url,i.image_name image_name,i.width width,i.height height FROM t_group_image gi JOIN t_image i ON gi.image_id=i.id WHERE gi.group_id=#{groupId}
SELECT * FROM t_collect WHERE group_id=#{groupId} AND user_id=#{userId}

SELECT g.id id,g.title title,g.text TEXT,g.image_id image_id ,g.istp istp ,i.image_url image_url,i.height height, i.width width, l.level LEVEL ,v.`url` video_url FROM t_group g JOIN t_image i ON g.image_id=i.id JOIN t_level l ON g.`level_id`=l.`id` LEFT JOIN t_video v ON g.`video_id`= v.`id` WHERE county_id=#{countyId} LIMIT #{index},#{size}

SELECT g.`id` id,g.`title` title,g.`text` TEXT,g.`istp` istp,i.`image_url` image_url,i.`width` width,i.`height` height, l.level LEVEL,v.`url` video_url FROM t_group g JOIN t_image i ON g.image_id=i.id JOIN t_level l ON g.`level_id`=l.`id` LEFT JOIN t_video v ON g.`video_id`=v.`id` WHERE g.title LIKE #{text}
SELECT i.image_url,i.height,i.width FROM t_carousel c JOIN t_image i ON c.image_id=i.id ORDER BY c.ordered
